idea-plugin.name: Gradle Wrapper Mirror
idea-plugin.description:
Gradle Wrapper Mirror

Automatically replace Gradle Wrapper distributionUrl with fast domestic mirrors (Aliyun, Tencent, Tsinghua Tuna, or your own URL) when opening/importing a project.

Supports:

  • One-click replacement or auto-replace on project open
  • Editable built-in mirror list (prevent link failure)
  • Custom mirror URL
  • “Replace only official address” switch

No more slow services.gradle.org downloads—enjoy flying speed!
idea-plugin.change-notes: • 1.0.0: Initial release with auto-replace and editable mirror table
